name: Fitburn FBT
description: What is the Fitburn Token (FBT) Project? The Fitburn Token (FBT) Project integrates fitness with blockchain, introducing an AI-powered fitness app that motivates users to achieve fitness goals through NFT rewards. The ecosystem includes a mobile app, NFTs related to fitness, and the CAL token for transactions and rewards. It offers a personalized fitness journey with AI, rewarding users with CAL tokens for fitness activities, and uses NFTs for app access and rewards. What Makes the Fitburn Token (FBT) Project Unique? The Fitburn Token Project stands out for its blend of fitness and digital economy. It uses AI for personalized fitness plans and dietary advice. The project's burn-to-earn model rewards users with CAL tokens for fitness achievements, gamifying exercise. NFTs are central, required for app use and enabling rewards and potential passive income. The CAL token facilitates ecosystem transactions, enables staking for rewards, and provides governance rights, promoting decentralized community involvement.
